Title: Serena Williams
Sentence: Some social scientists have argued that most negative reactions to Williams's on court fashion statements
column4: especially in newspaper coverage of Australian Open and Wimbledon
column5: combines with writers' fixation upon her muscular body to distract from her on court accomplishments and fit this commentary within centuries old narratives of "pornographic eroticism" and "sexual grotesquerie" of African and African American women.
